testcase.classname: Seller Preview And Add New Product
testcase.name: Seller previews a new product with an empty product category
testcase.system-out: Given the seller is logged in QAE10_GR03_seller@binar.com 4IKJKomARpjPH7aiyRZ0CQ==.passed And the seller navigates to the "Add New Product" page......................passed When the seller leaves the product category field empty and fills valid product name Laptop, price 5000000, description Used laptop and image C://Uploads//laptop-1.jpg.passed And clicks on the "Preview" button..........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product category should be displayed....passed And the seller remains on the "Add New Product" page........................passed

testcase.classname: Seller Preview And Add New Product
testcase.name: Seller previews a new product with an empty product name
testcase.system-out: When the seller enters an empty product name and fills valid product price 5000000, category 4, description Used laptop and image C://Uploads//laptop-1.jpg.passed And clicks on the "Preview" button..........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product name should be displayed........passed And the seller remains on the "Add New Product" page........................passed

testcase.classname: Seller Preview And Add New Product
testcase.name: Seller previews a new product with an empty product price
testcase.system-out: When the seller leaves the product price field empty and fills valid product name Laptop, category 4, description Used laptop and image C://Uploads//laptop-1.jpg.passed And clicks on the "Preview" button..........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product price should be displayed.......passed And the seller remains on the "Add New Product" page........................passed

testcase.classname: Seller Preview And Add New Product
testcase.name: Seller previews a new product with an empty product description
testcase.system-out: When the seller leaves the product description field empty and fills valid product name Laptop, price 5000000, category 4 and image C://Uploads//laptop-1.jpg.passed And clicks on the "Preview" button..........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product description should be displayed.passed And the seller remains on the "Add New Product" page........................passed

testcase.classname: Seller Preview And Add New Product
testcase.name: Seller previews a new product with all valid details
testcase.system-out: When the seller fills valid the to-be-previewed product name Laptop, price 5000000, category 4, description Used laptop and image C://Uploads//laptop-1.jpg.passed And clicks on the "Preview" button..........................................passed Then the to-be-previewed product is submitted with valid information Elektronik, Rp 5.000.000, Used laptop, Seller QA Group 03 Wave 10, Jakarta.passed

testcase.classname: Seller Preview And Add New Product
testcase.name: Seller publishes the previewed product
testcase.system-out: When the seller clicks on the "Terbitkan" button on product page............passed Then the "Terbitkan" button disappears......................................passed And the product page refreshes and the product is submitted with valid information Elektronik, Rp 5.000.000, Used laptop, Seller QA Group 03 Wave 10, Jakarta.passed
